title: Wherefore Now Ariseth the Illusion of a Third Dimension

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on canvas.

inscriptions: Signed lower left: Ivan Le Lorraine Albright
publication_history: Sarah Kelly Oehler, ed., Ivan Albright Paintings at the Art Institute of Chicago (Chicago: Art Institute of Chicago, 2019), https://www.artic.edu/digitalalbright, cat. 11 (ill.).
exhibition_history: Philadelphia, The Art Club, Annual Exhibition of Members of the Fellowship of the Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, Feb. 1934. Washington DC, Corcoran Gallery of Art, The 14th Biennial Exhibition of Contemporary American Oil Paintings, Mar. 24–May 5, 1935, cat. 214. Pittsburgh, Carnegie Institute, The 1937 International Exhibition of Paintings, Oct. 14–Dec. 5, 1937, cat. 97. Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, 133rd Annual Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture, Jan. 30–Mar. 6, 1938, cat. 23. Chicago, The Arts Club, Exhibition of Professional Members, Apr. 24–May 13, 1939. New York, Museum of Modern Art, American Realists and Magic Realists, 1943, cat. 31, ill. p. 25. New York, Rockefeller Center, Second Annual Portrait of America Exhibition, 1946; Seattle and Phoenix, cat. 1. New York, National Arts Club, The Allied Artists of America, 34th Annual Exhibition, Oct. 5–26, 1947, cat. 91. New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art, American Painting Today, 1950, cat. 3, pl. 10. Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, 151st Annual Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture, Jan. 22–Feb. 26, 1956, cat. 14. Art Institute of Chicago, Ivan Albright Retrospective Exhibition, Oct. 30–Dec. 27, 1964; Whitney Museum, Feb. 3–Mar. 21, 1965, cat. 17. Hanover, New Hampshire, Dartmouth College, Hopkins Center, Dec. 12, 1975–Jan. 11, 1976. Art Institute of Chicago, Works by Ivan L. Albright from the Collection, Oct. 21–Dec. 10, 1978, cat. 10. Chicago, Richard L. Feigen Gallery, Ivan Albright, Sept. 9–Oct. 15, 1988. Art Institute of Chicago, Ivan Albright: Magic Realist, Feb. 20–May 11, 1997; New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art, June 10–Sept. 7, 1997. Munich, Germany, Kunsthalle de Hypo–Kulturstiftung, Realism in the Twentieth Century, June 1–Septmber 2, 2001. Philadelphia Museum of Art, Audubon to Warhol: The Art of American Still Life, Oct. 27, 2015–Jan. 10, 2016, cat. 115. Toledo, OH, Toledo Museum of Art, Supernatural America: The Paranormal in American Art, June 12–Sept. 5, 2021; Louisville, KY, Speed Art Museum, Oct. 7, 2021–Jan. 2, 2022; Minneapolis, MN, Minneapolis Insittute of Art, Feb. 19–May 15, 2022.
provenance_text: Ivan Albright (1897–1983), 1931; given to the Art Institute of Chicago, 1977.

input: Wherefore Now Ariseth the Illusion of a Third Dimension
